description: Add user criteria after status_bottom hook.
replace:
$0

<xf:set var="$fieldNameUserStateNot" value="{$xf.options.thusercriteria_prefix}user_state_not" />
<xf:option name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameUserStateNot}][rule]" value="{$fieldNameUserStateNot}" selected="{$criteria.{$fieldNameUserStateNot}}"
		   label="{{ phrase('thusercriteria_user_state_is_not:') }}">
	<xf:dependent>
		<xf:select name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameUserStateNot}][data][state]" value="{$criteria.{$fieldNameUserStateNot}.state}">
			<xf:option value="valid">{{ phrase('valid') }}</xf:option>
			<xf:option value="email_confirm">{{ phrase('awaiting_email_confirmation') }}</xf:option>
			<xf:option value="email_confirm_edit">{{ phrase('awaiting_email_confirmation_from_edit') }}</xf:option>
			<xf:option value="email_bounce">{{ phrase('email_invalid_bounced') }}</xf:option>
			<xf:option value="moderated">{{ phrase('awaiting_approval') }}</xf:option>
			<xf:option value="rejected">{{ phrase('rejected') }}</xf:option>
			<xf:option value="disabled">{{ phrase('disabled') }}</xf:option>
		</xf:select>
	</xf:dependent>
</xf:option>

<xf:set var="$fieldNameUserStaff" value="{$xf.options.thusercriteria_prefix}staff" />
<xf:option name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameUserStaff}][rule]" value="{$fieldNameUserStaff}" selected="{$criteria.{$fieldNameUserStaff}}"
		   label="{{ phrase('th_usercriteria_user_is_staff') }}"/>

<xf:set var="$fieldNameUserNotStaff" value="{$xf.options.thusercriteria_prefix}not_staff" />
<xf:option name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameUserNotStaff}][rule]" value="{$fieldNameUserNotStaff}" selected="{$criteria.{$fieldNameUserStaff}}"
		   label="{{ phrase('th_usercriteria_user_is_not_staff') }}"/>
